name: Box 'Em Up!
description:
• A young boxer wants to become the world's greatest fighter by taking on the biggest names in boxing and pro-wrestling. While he does, he must fight the crime that has gathered in his home city Ignorancity.
  • E 10+ (Game includes cartoonish violence) Ages 10-15

A/Left = Move Left 

D/Right = Move Right

W/Space/Up= Jump

Shift = Dash

Left Click = Attack
